frameDefinitions: A Subpart of a Time_period is picked out.

An Item is located at the top end of a scale of importance or social rank (or some other Attribute) in comparison to other members of a Contrast_set (usually, implicit) that is otherwise similar in kind to the Item.

A Factor affects the outcome of an Undertaking, which  can be a goal-oriented activity or the maintenance of a desirable state, the work in a Field, or something portrayed as affecting an Interested_party.
A Survivor manages to avoid being negatively affected, despite encountering a Dangerous_situation.
This frame contains nouns denoting a rank or level within an established hierarchy.
In this frame, there is a Part of a Whole in which the Part is defined with respect to the canonical or inherent orientation of the Whole.
frameExamples: I nearly kicked my TV this afternoon after watching the shambolic <t><fex name='subpar'>end</fex></t> of the Austrian Grand-Prix .
The <t>main</t> problem is that the administration has not yet clarified 'Regime change.' INI
Temperature is the most <t>critical</t> factor in successful storage.
Wilderness Survival: Could You <t>Survive</t> the Wild?
listRoleDefinitions: The part of the <fen>Time_period</fen> which is profiled.
A temporal span conceived of as a whole.
This role indicates the <fen>Time</fen> that is being referred to.
An <fen>Item</fen> is the foremost thing in the <fen>Contrast_set</fen>.
This role identifies the domain (usually temporally or spatially defined) within which the <fen>Item</fen> is primary among its kind.
The <fen>Contrast_set</fen> is a group of entities similar to the <fen>Item</fen> out of which the <fen>Item</fen> is the most preeminent.
<fen>Factor</fen> is used for the concrete or abstract entity whose importance is assessed.
The <fen>Undertaking</fen> is a process or state or field of activity in which the <fen>Interested_party</fen> has a stake.
<fen>Interested_party</fen> identifies the people who are affected by a particular <fen>Factor</fen>.
A <fen>Factor</fen> may be generally important to the people or the activities in a field of endeavour.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important.
The <fen>Survivor</fen> lives through a <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen>.
The <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen> is one in which people are likely or expected to be negatively affected.
The time at which the surviving takes place.
The location where the <fen>Survivor</fen> (primarily) lives during the <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen>.
The Rank itself, usually denoted by the noun.
An entity which holds a particular <fen>Rank</fen>.
A piece of a larger <fen>Whole</fen>.
An undivided entity having all its <fen>Part</fen>s.
listRoleExamples: The findings mark the <fex>beginning</fex> of a new age of planetary science, in which 'extrasolar' planets can be directly measured and compared.
A zillion copies and clones have been made of this Russian game since it first was released in the mid <fex>80's</fex>.
The foremost band <fex>in the world of the 1960's</fex> was clearly the Beatles.
Our discussion has raised a number of issues, foremost <fex>among them</fex> time.
<fex>Being sure they are buying fresh food</fex> is important to most people.
Temperature is the most critical factor <fex>in successful storage</fex>.
Being sure they are buying fresh food is important <fex>to most people</fex>.
A successful GATT round is important <fex>for the world economy</fex>.
<fex>Last year</fex>, Florida residents survived the devastating triple punch of Hurricanes Frances, Ivan and Jeanne,
The top <fex>shelf</fex> of the bookcase was lying on the floor.
The show takes place in the West wing <fex>of the White House</fex>.
